facts.text: My memory is way better than people think! I can remember things for months, not just 3 seconds. That's a myth!
I can live for 30 years! With good care, I can be your friend for a really, really long time.
I can grow almost 2 feet long if I have enough space! Most people don't know how big I can get.
I'm super tough! I can survive in water with very little oxygen and even handle some pollution.
I've been a pet for over 1,000 years! People in ancient China first started keeping my ancestors as pets.

profile.habitat: Ponds, lakes, and slow-moving rivers in East Asia
profile.diet: Plants, algae, insects, and small crustaceans
